story: The portal crackles with interdimensional static before belching out a cloud of flour dust. Through the haze tumbles what appears to be a possessed kitchen appliance, its beaters spinning lazily and trailing wisps of otherworldly energy.

items.name: ValhallaMix 3000 Battle Mixer
items.description: A hand mixer that seems to have been enchanted by ancient Norse kitchen magic. The chrome body features runic engravings that pulse with a faint blue glow, and the beaters are forged from what appears to be dwarven steel. Small sparks occasionally shoot from the speed settings which are labeled in Elder Futhark.
items.damage: Speed setting 3 causes dimensional rifts, right beater slightly bent from fighting frost giants

equipmentSlots.effects: User's beard grows 3 inches longer and braids itself automatically (beardless users manifest a ghostly Viking beard)
Emits war chants when cooking, all baked goods come out shaped like longships

skills.name: Whisk of the Valkyries
skills.description: Summons a spectral choir of Valkyries to help whip cream or beat eggs while singing epic ballads about your baking prowess

skills.name: Ragnar√∂k Roll
skills.description: Violently mixes ingredients while creating a small localized thunder storm, guaranteed to make the fluffiest meringue in the nine realms
